name: 甘奈
text:
わぁ～……
良い感じのお部屋だねっ！
trans: Aah! This room's really nice!

name: 千雪
text: そうね～ゆっくりできそう……！
trans: Yes, it looks like we could really take our time to relax here!

name: 甘奈
text:
うんうん！
……あっ！
trans: Yeah! ...Ah!

name: 甘奈
text:
甜花ちゃん千雪さん、こっち来て！
窓からの眺め、めっちゃ綺麗だよ～！
trans: Tenka, Chiyuki, come over here! The outside view from the window's really beautiful!

name: 甜花
text: わあ……！
trans: Aah!

name: 千雪
text: わぁ、本当……
trans: Oh, you're right.

name: 千雪
text:
あっ
あの川って、今日行く予定のところかしら
trans: Oh, is that the river that we're plan to go to today?

name: 甘奈
text:
うん。焼き芋体験はあそこでするんだって～
上手に焼いちゃうよ～☆
trans: Yes. It's there that we can experience baking our own sweet potatoes. I'm so going to make a nice one.

name: 千雪
text: ふふ、甘奈ちゃん、気合十分ね……！
trans: Fufu, you sure are excited about this, Amana!

name: 甘奈
text: もっちろん、みんなで美味しく食べるんだもん
trans: Of course. After all, we're going to enjoy it together.

name: 甘奈
text:
～～♪
まだかな～、もういいかな～
trans: Is it done yet? Is it ready now?

name: 甜花
text:
けほけほっ
……あうぅ、煙で目、しぱしぱする……
trans: *coughs* Awh... the smoke makes Tenka's eyes bleary...

name: 甘奈
text: あ！　そっち風下だからこっち来て！
trans: Ah! The wind goes that way so come over here!

name: 甜花
trans: O-Okay.

name: 甘奈
text: ここなら大丈夫！
trans: You'll be just fine here!

name: 甜花
text: 大丈夫……！
trans: Tenka'll be just fine...

name: 千雪
text:
ふふ、よかったね甜花ちゃん……あ、
お芋、そろそろかしら？
trans: Fufu, isn't that nice, Tenka? Oh, isn't the sweet potatoes done now?

name: 甘奈
text: よーし！　じゃあ、ちょっと見てみよっーと！
trans: Alright! I'll check up on them!

name: 甘奈
text:
アツアツだし、そーっと……
──っと！
trans: Since it's quite hot, better be gentle about it and── there!

name: 甘奈
text:
じゃあ開けてみるね
じゃ～ん☆
trans: I'll be opening it now. Ta-dah!

name: 甜花
text: どんな感じ……？
trans: How did it turn out?

name: 甘奈
text:
め～～～……っちゃ、いい感じだよ～！
ほら、美味しそ～☆
trans: It looks sooooo nice! Look, don't they look delicious?

name: 甘奈
text: 甘奈、こんなに美味しそうな焼き芋初めて見たかも……！
trans: This is probably the first time I saw a roasted sweet potato this good!

name: 千雪
text: わぁ……上手に焼けたみたいね
trans: Oh, that looks done really well.

name: 甘奈
text:
うん！
じゃあ、はんぶんこして
trans: Yeah! Okay, I'm going share this now with you two.

name: 甘奈
text: はいっ、甜花ちゃんと千雪さん、どーぞ☆
trans: Here, Tenka, Chiyuki, have some.

name: 甜花
text:
あ、ありがと……
でも……ね
trans: T-Thank you... But...

name: 甜花
text:
なーちゃんが、焼いてくれたし……楽しみに、してた……し
最初に、食べてほしいな……
trans: You're the one who cooked it, Na-chan... and you were looking forward to it too... So, Tenka wants you to have a taste of it first...

name: 千雪
text:
そうね……ここの焼き芋体験のことを
見つけてくれたのも、甘奈ちゃんなんだし……
trans: Yes. You're also the one who found about this, Amana.

name: 甘奈
text: それくらいで大げさだよ～
trans: You two are making a big deal of those things.

name: 千雪
text:
ううん、大げさだってかまわないの
甘奈ちゃんに、最初に食べてほしいな
trans: I don't mind if you see it like that. Still, I want you to be the first one to taste it.

name: 甜花
text: ……うん
trans: Tenka thinks so too...

name: 甘奈
text:
甜花ちゃん、千雪さん……
……えへへ。それじゃあ──
trans: Tenka, Chiyuki... Ehehe, if you two insist,

name: 甘奈
text: いただきま～す！
trans: I'll have a bit of it then!

name: 甘奈
text:
……ーっ！
あっまーいっ！
trans: It taste so good!

name: 甘奈
text: ふたりも食べてみてよ～！
trans: You two should also try it!

name: 甜花
text: うん……
trans: Okay...

name: 千雪
text:
ん～……！
本当だ……甘くって、お菓子みたいね……！
trans: Mmm! You're right. It's sweet, almost like pastry!

name: 甘奈
text:
うんっ！　最高の天然スイーツかも☆
ね、甜花ちゃんも——
trans: Right! It's probably the best natural sweets ever! Don't you think so too, Tenka?

name: 甜花
text: ……あむ……あむ……んっ
trans: Om... nom... mmm.

name: 甜花
text:
ほくほくして……甘い……
にへへ、外でも……あったかい、ね……
trans: Soft, flaky... and sweet... Nihehe...  even we're outside... it feels so warm...

name: 甜花
text:
……あ、なくなっちゃった
もう１個……
trans: Oh, it's all gone... One more...

name: 千雪
text: ふふっ……
trans: Fufu.

name: 甘奈
text:
えへ！
まだいーっぱいあるから、好きなだけ食べちゃお☆
trans: Ehe, there's many of them left so eat as much as you can.

name: 甜花
text: お腹、いっぱい……
trans: Tenka's full now...

name: 千雪
text:
うん……！
ちょっと食べ過ぎちゃったかも……？
trans: Yes. Perhaps, we ate a little too much?

name: 甘奈
text:
お腹もいっぱいになったし、
ちょっとお散歩しない？
trans: Since we're all full, how about we take a quick stroll?

name: 甜花
text:
あ、それなら……！
千雪さん……
trans: Ah, in that case... Chiyuki...

name: 千雪
text:
……！　そうね……
甘奈ちゃん、ちょっとついてきてくれる？
trans: Oh, right. Amana, would you follow me, please?

name: 甘奈
text:
なになに？
楽しそうな顔して、なにがあるのっ？
trans: What is it? You two look like very happy, did you get your hands on something?

name: 千雪
text: それは……着いてからのお楽しみ♪
trans: Well, just look forward to it when we get there.

name: 甘奈
text: わぁあっ……
trans: Aah.

name: 甘奈
text:
すごい……
めっちゃ……綺麗
trans: Wow, it's so beautiful.

name: 甘奈
text:
旅館のお部屋で見えたのもすごかったけど……
ここの……なんていうんだろ
trans: It was beautiful when I saw it by the inn's window but... This... What is it called again?

name: 甘奈
text:
緑がずっと続いてて……
吸い込まれちゃいそう……
trans: The lush greens just keep on going... It feels like it's going I'm being sucked in...

name: 甜花
text: にへへ……良かった……
trans: Nihehe... Glad you liked it...

name: 甘奈
text:
…………景色だけじゃなくて
風で葉っぱが揺れる音も、気持ちいい……
trans: It's not just the view but the sound being made when the wind passes by the leaves feels so good.

name: 甘奈
text:
……甜花ちゃん、千雪さん、よくここ知ってたね
ガイドブックに、載ってたの？
trans: Tenka, Chiyuki, you seem to know about this place. Was this in the guidebook?

name: 千雪
text:
ううん。実は、旅館の人に聞いたの
地元の人もあまり知らない、とっておきスポットなんだって
trans: No. Actually, we heard it from someone at the inn. Not even the locals know about this, so this is really a special spot.

name: 甘奈
text:
そっかぁ……
だから他に、誰もいないんだね……
trans: I see. So, that's why there's no other people around.

name: 甜花
text:
うん……
なーちゃんと、甜花と、千雪さん……だけ、だよ
trans: Yes... This place is just for... Na-chan, Tenka and Chiyuki...

name: 甘奈
text:
この景色……
３人で独占しちゃうなんて——
trans: To think that we would have this view to just ourselves...

name: 甘奈
text: ——こんな贅沢、初めてかも
trans: I guess this is the first time I got something so grand.
